title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel set in the Jazz Age that tells the tragic story of Jay Gatsby and his unrequited love for Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality told through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.
